response.job_title: BSc Mechatronics/ MSc Automation/ MSc Artificial Intelligence
response.summary: Professional in Mechatronics Engineering with a solid background in Industrial Automation, Artifical Intelligence and Mechanical Engineering Studies, with more than 10 Years of Experience focused in designing and devloping strategies through the analysis of technological, human and financial factors that guarantees the avalability and reliability of different company assets. Definition and simulation for different manufacturing process for Technical Systems. Proficient in Thermal Systems, OEMs and Wholesalers Support, Training, Bussines Intelligence and Customer Development, Energy Efficency, IIoT; Social and interpersonal skills aimed to an strategic and sustainable teamwork vision; Abilities to lead under motivation and team coordination/communication focused on achieve objectives.
response.skills: Customer Service, Project Management, Customer Support, Employee Training, Training, Data Analysis, Internet of Things (IoT), SOLIDWORKS, Control Systems Design, JavaScript, HTML, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Embedded Devices, Field Service Engineering, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Linux, C++, C, Data Analytics, MATLAB

profile_positions.description:
- Building customer tailored solutions for technology-oriented customers worldwide.
- Support the company's sales activity with training customers and solving their technical challenges.
- Integrating and providing cloud solutions into customer's IT infrastructure.
- Implementing integrations between IOT/Computer vision products and customers cloud servers
profile_positions.title: Field Application Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Providing customer with applied sales technical support regarding design, implementation of automation solutions focused in Energy Savings
- Development of detailed engineering, blueprints, diagramming, programming, integration and installation of automation solutions
- Data Analysis, data-trends and IIoT deployment
- Fast-Prototyping of a embedded system for signal monitoring, helping to reduce energy consumptions
- Artificial Intelligence based on Data Analytics to predict optimal maintenance time for electromechanical systems
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Providing OEMs and Wholesalers of Air-Conditioning and Refrigeration equipment, technical support for the selection of their products.
- Training internal and external customers. Applied technical sales, customer profiles and customer development for Andean and Central-america regions.
- Data Analysis, data-trends and IIoT deployment
- Developing customer technical and commercial information to optimize product portfolio
- Successful implementation of internal and external customer training plan across Latin America
- Specification with several customers (hard-discount retailers) about company solutions for energy consumption
profile_positions.title: Senior Application Engineer

company.name: Cipia
company.description:
Cipia is a leading provider of intelligent sensing solutions that use edge-based computer vision and AI for safer and better mobility experiences. The company's product lineup includes Driver Sense (driver monitoring system), Cabin Sense (occupancy monitoring system) and Cipia-FS10, a complete video telematics and a driver monitoring solution for telematics service providers and fleets.
Over a decade of research and development stand behind the company's proprietary market-leading computer vision technology, which has been selected by OEMs globally and serves vehicles on the roads today
